landing.solutionText: Diets fail because they rely on willpower. SlowCarb works because it replaces willpower with simple rules. No calorie counting, no starving, no confusion. Just follow 5 rules and eat until you're full. The result: 8 to 10 kg in 6 weeks, without the gym.
landing.rulesSubtitle: No calculations. No supplements. Just follow these rules and eat until you're full.

rules.title: No white carbs
rules.description: No bread, pasta, rice, potatoes, or sugar. No exceptions during the week.

rules.title: 30g protein within 30 min
rules.description: Eat at least 30 grams of protein within 30 minutes of waking up to kickstart your metabolism.

rules.title: No liquid calories
rules.description: Drink water, coffee, and tea. No soda, fruit juice, milk, or alcohol (except on cheat day).

rules.title: No fruit
rules.description: Fructose slows fat burning. Avocado and tomato are allowed in limited amounts.

rules.title: Legumes with every meal
rules.description: Beans, lentils, and chickpeas provide lasting energy and keep you full.

landing.cheatdayText: One day per week you eat whatever you want. This is not optional. It resets your hormones and makes the diet sustainable.

faqs.question: Is this safe?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. The slow carb diet is based on whole foods like eggs, vegetables, legumes, and lean meat. It is not a crash diet. You simply eat nutritious meals that keep you full longer.

faqs.question: What can I eat on a cheat day?
faqs.answer: Anything. The cheat day is essential to the protocol. On Saturday (or your chosen day) you eat whatever you want. Pizza, ice cream, chips. This resets your metabolism and makes the diet mentally sustainable.

faqs.question: Do I have to count calories?
faqs.answer: No. That is exactly the point of SlowCarb. You follow the 5 simple rules and eat until you are full. No apps, no scales, no stressing over numbers.

faqs.question: How long do I have access?
faqs.answer: Forever. You pay once and get lifetime access to all recipes, the shopping list, and future updates. No hidden costs.

faqs.question: What if it does not work?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30 day money back guarantee. If you are not satisfied, send us an email and you will get a full refund. No questions asked.

landing.finalCtaText: In 6 weeks you could be 8 to 10 kg lighter. No hunger, no doubt, no hassle.
